forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. High 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will taper off to light snow this afternoon. High 38F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to snow showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Snow showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. High 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 13F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later at night. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later at night. Low 14F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 18F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to rain showers later on. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain in the morning...mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
